docs.text: LCut (Link Cut) simple link shortener in python and flask Start app flask --app main run Config DATABASE_FILE -> json file URL -> app web address Example: import os DATABASE_FILE = os.path.join(os.getcwd(), "db.json") URL = "127.0.0.1:5000" Using Modules import database, linkgen, config # get json file db = database.load(config.database_file) # search link in db print(database.search_link(db, "Ax2Ui3")) # add link database.append(db, linkgen.generate_random_symbols(8), "example.com") # save link database.write(config.database_file, db) Template Form stored in "templates/index.html" Example:
